name: Conrad Algarve

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled on business
reviews.text: As soon as we arrived we were whisked away to paradise. They met us with cool clothes to refresh and had a quick check in our room was 430 which was in a great location away from elevators and was very quiet! Loved the extra touches as a tv in wall of tub what a great idea! Work out room was the bomb.com loved the technology they had there wish I could've worked out more never thought I'd say that on a vacation lol breakfast was included and I loved the yogurt with blackberries the best I've ever had
reviews.title: Paradise!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled on business
reviews.text: great hotel in a great location quality of hotel and its services excellent .service provided by staff friendly and always helpful nothing too much trouble .the view at dusk out over the swimming pool with the torches lighting was brilliant and the pool itself was one of the best infinity pools seen.the location and the fantastic entrance gives real class to this venue.quality of food and bar service as good as ever experienced.well done.
reviews.title: golf trip

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Simply the easiest review I've ever written!
reviews.title: Amazing.......

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed for 5 days with my wife for a relaxing break. Every member of staff was polite, helpful and friendly.
reviews.title: Wonderful

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled on business
reviews.text: Food is amazing, rooms well appointed and comfortable and the whole place has a quality that is very deserving of the 5 star rating.
reviews.title: Conrad Algarve

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Spent three great days here with my wife for a well needed escape. We loved the stay; service, food, spa - everything was great. We both indulged in a massage and loved the staff and service. We had breakfast here each day as well as an amazing dinner one night. The food was creative, had a great local flavor and the service was excellent. Our room was comfortable - but didnt have any view - I would request a pool view as it is much nicer than the alternative. That would be the only negative we had. Oh yes... and room service was prompt and very good. I would definately go back here.
reviews.title: Beautiful Property - A quiet and Relaxing Escape

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled on business
reviews.text: I stopped at this hotel for 3 days in September and i must say it is probably one of the finest hotels i have ever stayed in.
reviews.title: Simply Amazing

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel itself is beautifully decorated and is really modern. The grounds are stunning and really well kept. The view off the balcony overlooking the countryside was to die for.
reviews.title: Luxury Living with First Class Service

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled on business
reviews.text: Each meal we had there was perfectly cooked and was enjoyed by all.
reviews.title: Great quality and Service

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled with family
reviews.text: Lastly the staff from the receptionists, maids and bar workers to the managers greeted you at all times with a friendly smile and could not do enough for you.
reviews.title: Superb hotel, best in Quinta do Lago

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled with family
reviews.text: We stayed in this hotel for the final 3 days of a holiday following 10 days in a large villa with extended family. The hotel was everything we had been promised - the service was exceptional, the amenities luxurious, the spa a delight and the overall ambiance everything we could have expected. The room was well appointed and the inclusion of a kitchinette made looking after our baby very easy. The inclusion of a cot in the standard sized room however did leave us very cramped - a larger room for this circumstance would be advised. We are already planning our return, probably for a long weekend. The proximity to the airport, the ease of transferand the promise of more sun than Ireland make it all very tempting.
reviews.title: Excellent end to a holiday

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: It"s about time europe got it"s act together when it comes to real 5 star hotel quality and finally they have done it with the Conrad Algarve.
reviews.title: WONDERFUL

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This place is superb in every way possible,from the lovely modern rooms to the dining,all of which are top notch.
reviews.title: Wonderful hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The staff are the best i have ever come accross on my travels in europe and make the hotel even better.
reviews.title: Sensational

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Well done Conrad..
reviews.title: Brillant stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed for 2 nights en route from Seville to Lisbon.
reviews.title: Amazing stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Gorgeous hotel, absolutely stunning grounds, beautiful rooms.
reviews.title: Fantastic hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: You could really tell the hotel is determined to give exquisite service - which translated into it being a little overbearing from some younger and more inexperienced waiters, who were a little too eager to please, but admittedly, that's a ridiculous thing to complain about :)
reviews.title: So good I had to review.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2013, traveled with friends
reviews.text: The restaurant is fantastic for one dinner....second time around, you realize you've had everything on the menu the night before...but everything is absolutely delicious.
reviews.title: The sexiest hotel in the Algarve.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Maybe one of the best hotels we've ever stayed in.
reviews.title: Excellent Service

aka: Conrad Algarve Quinta Do Lago, Portugal
description: The Conrad Algarve is one of the most modern 5 star hotels in the Algarve. This contemporary luxury hotel is uniquely styled, from the guest rooms to the private balconies, from the majestic spa to the five individual restaurants and bars, offering a sophisticated range of fine Portuguese and international cuisine.With an impressive setting in the exclusive, yet naturally beautiful Quinta do Lago, the Conrad Algarve is located next to the Atlantic Ocean. Reaching golden, unspoilt Algarve beaches is simple with the dedicated shuttle bus. Many internationally famous golf courses, including Quinta do Lago Sul and Laranjal are on your doorstep, as is the natural park of Ria Formosa.
